alert.note: Alert for Bell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 24 at 11:00PM EST until February 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Pineville affecting Bell County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Pineville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM EST Thursday the stage was 998.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is nearing its crest, but will continue to run high through Friday morning. - Action stage is 995.0 feet. - Flood stage is 1002.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement when you can do so safely. The next statement will be issued by 11 AM Friday.
